articles.author: Matt Barlow
articles.title: Jose Mourinho says beating his Chelsea 86-game Premier League unbeaten record is 'very difficult' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Liverpool's run without a Premier League defeat at Anfield came to an end after almost four years, but Chelsea did not lose a league game at Stamford Bridge from February 2004 until October 2008.
articles.content:
Jose Mourinho admits it is going to take something extra special to crack the 86-game unbeaten home record set by his Chelsea team.

articles.title: Manchester United's Bruno Fernandes and Man City's Kevin De Bruyne feature in FIFA 21 TOTY - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: The FIFA 21 TOTY Ultimate XI features both Man United midfielder Bruno Fernandes and Manchester City's Kevin De Bruyne, but there's no spot for Lionel Messi.
articles.content:
With both players showcasing outstanding form during 2020, Manchester United's Bruno Fernandes and Manchester City's Kevin De Bruyne feature in the FIFA 21 TOTY Ultimate XI.

articles.author: Kathryn Batte
articles.title: Facundo Pellistri's agent says the Man United winger will join a LaLiga club on loan this month - Daily Mail
articles.description: United signed Pellistri for £10million from Uruguayan club Penarol in the summer transfer window. The 19-year-old has trained with the first-team but is yet to make his senior debut.
articles.content:
Facundo Pellistri's agent has confirmed the Manchester United winger is set to join a LaLiga club on loan for the rest of the season.
